name: Space Recall
description:
Game Play

On the "peaceful" space station, a large number of out-of-control robots. You'll take control of the new E-201 and use your attributes, collect powerful skills, and match items to create a powerful Combo that can defeat a wide variety of enemies.

Skill Consumption

E-201 can store fuel, hydrogen, electricity three kinds of energy. Skills costs energy, which varies from skill to skill. Use the powerful skill only by reasonable collocation of equipment and planning of energy use.

Combined Effect

There are combined between skills and items, and raising the appropriate amount can activate the corresponding combined effect. The combined effect is a good boost to the player, often able to turn defeat into victory at the key moment of the battle.
Selective Reward/h2]
Carrying forward the traditional art of the roguelike game, players can choose the rewards of the next level as needed during the adventure: crystal (ready to buy), chip (collect and upgrade active skills), equipment (acquire passive skills).

Multiple Enemy

A variety of out-of-control robots will attack you on your way through, and they will attack in different ways. Being familiar with their behavior patterns will help you beat them.

Obstacle Challenge

The trap of the horizontal board game is never absent. The challenge of the organ set a rich reward, the higher the risk, the greater the return, the more confident in their own operation of friends do not miss.

Powerful Boss

There is always a goalkeeper at each mark, they have particularly strong skills and attributes.
Galaxy Race/h2]
A race of speed and passion in a thrilling cosmic adventure. Winning the tournament unlocks more generous rewards.
